content: Evaluation of the Antidiarrhoeal Activity of Aqueous Stem Bark Extract of Terminalia catappa in Castor oil-induced Diarrhoeal Albino Rats. Fountain Journal of Natural and Applied Sciences, [S. l.], v. 11, n. 2, 2022. DOI: 10.53704/fujnas.v11i2.413. Disponível em: https://fountainjournals.com/index.php/FUJNAS/article/view/413.
